name: Blinded
shortDescription: The character cannot see. All actions that require sight automatically fail. Attack rolls against the character gain a +2 bonus, and the character's attack rolls suffer a -4 penalty.

name: Deafened
shortDescription: The character cannot hear. All actions that require hearing automatically fail. The character cannot use verbal spell components.

name: Exhausted
shortDescription: The character is physically exhausted. All ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws suffer a -2 penalty. Movement is reduced by half.

name: Frightened
shortDescription: The character is gripped by fear. The character must attempt to flee from the source of fear. If unable to flee, the character can fight but suffers a -2 penalty to all rolls.

name: Grappled
shortDescription: The character is being held or restrained by another creature. The character cannot move and suffers a -2 penalty to attack rolls. Breaking free requires an opposed Strength check.

name: Paralyzed
shortDescription: The character is frozen and cannot move or act. The character is helpless and can be automatically hit by melee attacks. The character can still think and perceive.

name: Petrified
shortDescription: The character has been turned to stone. The character is completely immobile and unaware of surroundings. The character is considered an object with AC 9.

name: Poisoned
shortDescription: The character is suffering from poison. The character suffers a -2 penalty to all ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The exact effects depend on the poison type.

name: Prone
shortDescription: The character is lying on the ground. Melee attack rolls against the character gain a +2 bonus, but ranged attack rolls suffer a -2 penalty. Standing up requires a move action.

name: Stunned
shortDescription: The character is stunned and cannot take actions. The character drops anything held and is flat-footed. The character can attempt to recover with a Fortitude save.

name: Unconscious
shortDescription: The character is knocked out and helpless. The character cannot take any actions and is unaware of surroundings. The character is flat-footed and can be automatically hit by melee attacks.
